nodes.text: Jal'Jinis was a male Human who worked as a stimulants merchant during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, he operated a stall in the Alien Enclave Market of the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss. Jal'Jinis wore gray clothing while at his stall. He had fair skin, brown hair and blue eyes.

Jal'Jinis first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a Republic and Imperial heavy armor vendor on the planet Voss. His location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
